TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1<class System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of non-selectable dates in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection contains objects that specify multiple dates that cannot be selected by a user. To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method. ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* One or more object elements of type . ## Examples The following example creates a in code and markup that has some dates that cannot be selected. [!code-cs[CalendarSnippets#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/calendarsnippets/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-xml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/calendarsnippets_xaml/window1.xaml#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/calendarsnippets_vb/window1.xaml.vb#3)] The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.") Calendar with dates that cannot be selected

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddDatesInPast() cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds all dates before <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A> to the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this method to prevent users from selecting dates that are in the past.
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> that includes a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event handler.
[!code-xml[CalendarSnippets#6](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/calendarsnippets_xaml/window1.xaml#6)]
The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event handler. The event handler calls the AddDatesInPast method to make only future dates selectable.
[!code-cs[CalendarSnippets#7](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/calendarsnippets/window1.xaml.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#7](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/calendarsnippets_vb/window1.xaml.vb#7)]
